body:
This includes:

- any questions or feedback you leave
- your email address (if you leave feedback)
- your IP address, and details of which version of web browser you used
information on how you use the site

This helps us to:

- improve the site by monitoring how you use it
- respond to any feedback or questions you send us, if you’ve asked us to

We can’t identify you using your data.

### Where your data is stored

Any information you provide when using the service is held by [SurveyMonkey](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/). Check the [SurveyMonkey privacy policy](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/mp/policy/privacy-policy/) to find out what it does with your information.

### Links to other websites

This privacy policy only applies to this service. It doesn’t cover the other services and websites that we link to.

### Following a link to another website

If you go to another website from this service, read the privacy policy on that website to find out what it does with your information.

### Following a link to this service from another website

If you come to this service from another website, we may receive personal information about you from the other website. Read the privacy policy of that website to find out more.
